attributes.action: Force UEFA to rethink their stance on Irish players playing for Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UEFA recently opened up a possibility for foreigners from the Republic of Ireland to play for British Northern Ireland. This was done with complete opposition from the IFA. We now demand that UEFA reinforce that only citizens of Northern Ireland, and people of Northern Ireland descent can play for the province in International Football.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
